document.full_text: david beckham and the los angeles galaxy suffered a humbling 4-1 thrashing at the hands of real salt lake in major league soccer on saturday while the philadelphia union earned their second straight win.
document.title: beckham and galaxy get real beating
lines_and_colors: david beckham and the los angeles galaxy suffered a humbling 4-1 thrashing at the hands of real salt lake in major league soccer on saturday while the philadelphia union earned their second straight win.
